preqs: ATS2004 or ATS2005 or ATS3005 or ATS2006 or ATS3006 or ATS3007 or ATS3008 or equivalent

rules.ruleString: For commencement date before `01-JAN-2014` Do Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {CHI%040, CHI%050, CHI%060, CHI%070, CHI%080, CHI%090, CHI%100, CHI%110, CHI%120, CHI%904, CHI%905, CHI%906, CHI%907, CHI%908, CHI%909, CHI%910, CHI%911, CHI%912, CHI1220} Otherwise Must have passed an (I/W) unit in {ATS2004, ATS2005, ATS2006, ATS3005, ATS3006, ATS3007, ATS3008}

unitName: Chinese online media: Contemporary issues and perspectives
description: Through the study of graded Chinese news articles, this unit will introduce students to the language and issues of Chinese and international current affairs. Topics covered include culture, politics, economics, the environment, international relations, international events and social issues. Students will also develop research and language skills tailored to the Chinese language Internet.
